messages.subject: 2 pics >>> "Photos"
messages.msgSnippet: the image of Nagakura s daughter and the new picture of Fujita Goro is in Photos folder which deals with Shinsengumi and related people. I have been
messages.messageBody:
the image of Nagakura's daughter and the new picture of Fujita Goro is
in "Photos">>>folder which deals with Shinsengumi and related people.

I have been following posts at http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/index.html

and one person believes that the new Fujita Goro picture is a collage
(a combination of 2-3 images)...but just because it is a collage does
not mean that the man identified is NOT Fujita Goro because collaging
was used in that era to fit people onto one image for convenience (^_^)
